Scared straight

This will upset the lords of §Y[mta_executed.TopLiege.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]§!, lowering their opinion of you by §R-10§!.
Since §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! is from an enemy country, no one will object.

Any close family of §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! will be upset.

You order the jailor to drag [From.GetTitledFirstName] from [From.GetHerHis] cell while you methodically prepare your tools. No one crosses you unscathed and [From.GetFirstName] will become a living example of this. At least that's the plan, but who knows? You could... slip.
Actually, take them back to their cell for now.
Your face could use a touch up!
Keep one eye open, or I will for you while I cut it out.
A hand will do. Stay still!
Let's see how you manage with one leg, shall we?
I'm getting rid of your manhood.
The order is to be given on your command for [From.GetTitledFirstName] to be executed, as soon as you decide on a fitting way for [From.GetHerHim] to die.
Actually, I need to think about this first.
Off with [From.GetHerHis] head!
[From.GetSheHeCap] is to be hanged.
Burn [From.GetHerHim] at the stake!
Carve [From.GetHerHis] lungs out [From.GetHerHis] back and make [From.GetHerHim] into a blood eagle, for [norse_pagan.GetHighGodName]!
Have this [From.GetManWoman] hanged, drawn, and quartered.
Time for the garrote.
Nail [From.GetHerHim] to a cross.
Stone [From.GetHerHim] to death.
Coat [From.GetHerHim] in sweet things between boats to be eaten alive by insects!
Have [From.GetHerHim] trampled by horses!
Let's watch [From.GetHerHim] get mauled to death by a bear!
Slowly impale [From.GetHerHim] on sharp growing bamboo.
Feed [From.GetHerHim] to the lions!
[From.GetSheHeCap] will be my prey in a great hunt. Meow.
Throw [From.GetHerHim] into the drowning-pit.
Impale [From.GetHerHim]!
Get [From.GetHerHim] in the brazen bull and start the fire.
Flay [From.GetHerHim] like an animal!
[From.GetSheHeCap]'s going to make great tiger food!
Let our elephants toy with [From.GetHerHim].
Slowly crush [From.GetHerHim] under stone.
Wall [From.GetHerHim] up alive!
Out with [From.GetHerHis] intestines!
Break [From.GetHerHis] back!
Leave [From.GetHerHim] in the wilds to be eaten.
I have a spot in my garden just for [From.GetHerHim]!
[From.GetSheHeCap] is to be publicly devoured by animals.
[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] is hereby condemned to death by beasts—a popular form of entertainment among the [roman.GetName] lower class.
Away with [FromFrom.GetHerHim] to the lions!
I wonder how long [FromFrom.GetSheHe] will last against a bear?
Let's make this magnificent and bring the elephants!
Bring a fine boar with great tusks to have its way with [FromFrom.GetHerHim].
Specific Mutilation

As §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! is your prisoner, you may give the order to mutilate [Root.GetHerHim] as a punishment. While §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! will probably survive, the injuries will be permanent.
Specific Execution
As §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! is your prisoner, you may give the order to execute [Root.GetHerHim] as a punishment.
